post:
I am selling my Hostigation 128MB KVM XMAS plan. I have acquired this from @Asim , but I did not have a use for it after all. 

Here are the specs
* 128MB RAM
* 5GB HDD
* 500GB Bandwidth
* Los Angeles

Paid until Dec 22, 2012 so there is still ~11 months of paid-service left.

I'm looking for about 16-17$ to get it transferred into your account.

Tim has been kind enough to let me transfer it to anyone under the following conditions
* The new owner cannot be an already terminated (for abuse) customer of Hostigation.com
* No Transfer fees charged by Hostigation

Payment has to go in PayPal, send me a PM with your offer! :)
